comments.body:
Can we add more deep test case like the following?
```scala
scala> sql("select explode(explode(explode(explode(array(array(array(array(1, 2), array(3, 4))))))))").show()
+---+
|col|
+---+
|  1|
|  2|
|  3|
|  4|
+---+
```

        .select(explode(explode_outer($"ar"))),
      Row(7) :: Row(9) :: Nil)
